h3_title: Captain Lotus-Vision Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Other times, he may trigger a bunch of explosions on the floor, which only give you a moment's notice to dodge them, so stay mobile and roll around for a better chance of not getting hit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Lotus-Vision.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Lotus-Vision', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Lotus-Vision' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Lotus-Vision Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, he may trigger a bunch of explosions on the floor, which only give you a moment's notice to dodge them, so stay mobile and roll around for a better chance of not getting hit.
